page.title: 13TRIP TO KINGLEY VALE cont.
page.content:
tested our balancing skills.
On reaching the top, we could see the South Coast and the Isle of Wight, a good view for map reading.
We walked a short distance to the tumuli and played a Sussex game based on a legend _ whilst holding your breath, run round the hump three times to make the devil jump on your back!
We picnicked halfway up the hill, although there were no litter bins, lavatories or shops anywhere.
An ideal place for kite flying and in winter tobogganing is fun. Grass skiing is possible. The area is ideal for rambling, but dogs must be kept on leads.
